(sacred [holy], magic-being [magicbeing])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
A Yavana is a Yaksha warrior of the sacred Mount Kailasa. They are semi-divine beings gifted with Celestial Splendor that strikes lowly beings with awe. Their mystical powers have made them rulers over the Bandar Log and they are sacred to the monkey people. Yavanas are armed with falchion and buckler or a longbow.
